casebody.data:
First Department,

December, 1966

(December 1, 1966) Anita Manville, Respondent, v. Thomas F. Manville, Jr., et al., Appellants.

Order, entered on May 2, 1966, denying defendants’ motion to dismiss the complaint unanimously affirmed, without costs or disbursements to any party, but without prejudice to a new motion on proper papers. Defendants may move anew on the basis of the prior Nevada judgment, upon the pleading of the applicable affirmative defense. Concur-—Breitel, J. P., McNally, Stevens, Steuer and Capozzoli, JJ.
